title: Beef Goulash
directions: fry bacon in a cold, heavy stewing pot until fat is rendered and then discard bacon
saute onions in bacon fat until translucent. Can add olive oil if there is not enough bacon fat.
add meat and saute with onions for about 10 minutes
mix caraway seeds with choopped garlic and add to meat.
remove from heat, stir in paprika and add warm water. Water should just cover meat and leave room for potatoes
add beef bouillon cubes, cover and cook over low heat for 1 hour
cut tomatoes into i-inch pieces, slice green pepper
after 1 hour of braising, add tomatoes and pepper. Add a little more water if necessary and simmer for 30 minutes
add cubed potatoes and cook another 30 minutes until potatoes are fork tender
mix sour cream with a little goulash in a cup and add back to goulash
serve with spaetzle and dollop of sour cream
ingredients: 2.5 lbs stewing beef cut into cubes
2 Tbsp sour cream, plus more for plating
